text: - Hello, I'm Mohit Aron.
I'm the Founder and Chief Strategy
and Technology Officer at Cohesity.

Current market trends that
we are seeing are, you know,

there's a explosion in the
rise in ransomware attacks.
There's a ransomware attack
happening every 20 seconds or so.

The second big trend is
there's a huge demand
for getting more from the data,
so especially with generative AI,
and Cohesity offers both of them.
Data is the new oil, you know?
It's the crown jewels of any organization.
A lot of the data just sits there, dark,

and people are not able
to get value of that.

Now with gen AI, finally
the customers see a way

to get some light, or shine
a light on that dark data.

And so there's a huge
demand from customers on,
"How can I leverage this new technology
to get more value out of my data?"

I think the biggest
misconception about generative AI
is that it is here to steal our jobs.
In my opinion, people just need to know
how to leverage it well,

and they can do so much
more with what they do.
AWS helps my software company
by bringing us more credibility
that we may not otherwise have,
given that we are a small company,
but with the AWS backing behind us,

we get so much more
visibility and credibility.
(upbeat music)
